allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: allow authenticated users to insert leads

The RLS INSERT policy only targeted the anon role, but the Supabase
JS client reuses the authenticated session from localStorage when
an admin is logged in, causing 403 on lead submissions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(devbox\): fix VS Code user, add post-apply notes to TUI summary

- Add chown step for .vscode-server to fix permission denied after
  userns keep-id root sessions
- Add vscode-devbox.sh client setup script \(cross-platform\)
- Capture reporter.Info\(\) as Notes in orchestrator.Result so post-apply
  instructions survive into the summary screen \(TUI and headless\)
- Display "Proximos passos" section in summary with client setup command
- Update README with VS Code + devbox section and module table

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /run/host/var/home/ale/Documents/fleetu-hotsite commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: migrate to pnpm 10 via mise

Replace npm/corepack-managed pnpm 9.15.0 with mise-managed pnpm 10.29.2.
Add .npmrc with public-hoist-pattern for tailwindcss compatibility and
onlyBuiltDependencies allowlist for pnpm 10 security defaults.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
